snippet: Islamists who have taken control of Timbuktu smashed the wooden door of an old mosque on Monday, continuing a campaign of destruction.
abstract: Islamists, after a coup in Mali, have taken control of Timbuktu, one of Africa’s most historic cities, smashing the wooden door of an old mosque and continuing a campaign of destruction of religious monuments that has drawn condemnation from the United Nations and the International Criminal Court; group is calling for imposition of Shariah law.
lead_paragraph: Islamists who have taken control of Timbuktu smashed the wooden door of an old mosque on Monday, continuing a campaign of destruction.

headline.main: Mali Islamists Exert Control, Attacking Door to a Mosque
headline.print_headline: Mali Islamists Exert Control, Attacking Door to a Mosque
